* Iron Raptor growled as she heard Zardus's insisting that they stay, still walking calmly towards the Ark.
She knew that they could not get away without damage but she had to try, it was simply ignoring the Alliance so that they got tired of them and left them alone
 But it didn't work!
Without even bothering to look behind her she simply stepped aside and watched the charge sail harmlessly away, then turning towards Zardus she took the charges shot by the remainder of the Alliance in the chest.
She never flinched and she never cried out in pain, just stared at Zardus with cold optics beneith her black brow-plate.
This was going way to far, and they would see just what it was like to deal with an enraged fembot!!!
Iron Raptor stayed silent as she then began to walk towards Zardus, the same expression on her face...nothing, but the look of hate in her optics!
She took every shot, every charge with no comment or reaction, simply walking calmly but steadily and with cause towards her target.
With a growl she looked at Tavatron and how she faught, it was a brave stand but she knew that it was no use.
Rage building inside her but remaining reactionless.
Iron Raptor then stopped a few feet from Zardus, a snarl heard from her throat.
She reached behind her and came up with the sword Liono had given her, with a single and effertless swips she then swept it in front of her.
The blade glowing and a single blade of energy then slicing towards Zardus and his crew.
Not a word from her mouth.*
